meanings.definition: A treeless grassy plain in South America.
meanings.sent1: The llanos are vast grasslands in South America.
meanings.sent2: Many animals roam freely on the llanos.
meanings.sent3: The llanos are so flat, it's like nature's dance floor!
meanings.sent4: The llanos stretch out like a green carpet under the sky.
meanings.sent5: The llanos seem to go on forever, with no trees in sight.

meanings.definition: A type of music originating from the llanos region.
meanings.sent1: The llanos music has a lively beat.
meanings.sent2: People dance joyfully to the rhythms of llanos music.
meanings.sent3: Listening to llanos music always puts a smile on my face.
meanings.sent4: The llanos music carries the spirit of the land in its notes.
meanings.sent5: The llanos music is like a cheerful celebration in song.
